question: What is the average amount of interest per year which the company had to pay during this period?
answer_description: Average amount of interest paid by the Company during the given period= Rs.23.4 + 32.5 + 41.6 + 36.4 + 49.4lakhs5= Rs.183.3lakhs5= Rs. 36.66 lakhs.
